column1: #Text=But fear has moved in where trust should be .
#Text=I 've been expecting you and the young Avatar for quite a long time .
#Text=I had a vision many years ago of helping him .
#Text=That 's why I came to the Eastern Air Temple .
#Text=Let the clouds in your mind be gentle , peaceful ones .
#Text=" Pathik says : " Someone looks very well rested , judging by your bed head .
#Text=" Pathik says : " I have prepared a message for Aang .
#Text=May I attach it to your horn ?
#Text=You and the Avatar 's energies are mixed .
#Text=By reading your energy , I can sense where Aang is .
#Text=Funny , what invisible strings connect us all .

#Text=" Main Appa Kyoshi Warriors Pathik Suki Antagonists Azula Boar - q - pine Circus trainer Farmer and wife Ghashiun Mai Sandbenders Ty Lee says : " Minor Aang Appa 's mother ( flashback only ) Beetle - headed merchants Hakoda Iio ( flashback only ) Iroh Long Feng Momo Other flying bison ( flashback only ) Shuzumu Toph Unnamed Fire Nation boy Unnamed Fire Nation man Zuko " Aang says : " Momo !
#Text=Hey guys , I think this river 's polluted .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well that explains why I ca n't catch a fish around here , because normally my fishing skills are off the hook !
#Text=" Toph says : " Too bad your skills are n't on the hook .
#Text=" Katara says : " It looks like we 'll need to go somewhere else to get food , assuming that 'll fit into Sokka 's master schedule .
#Text=But that means only two potty breaks today .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , maybe we can get food there !
#Text=" Aang says : " Now you look just like a little hill with horns !
